title: List of smallest exoplanets
text:
Below is a list of the smallest <a href="exoplanet">exoplanet</a>s so far discovered, in terms of physical size, ordered by radius. Some of these are unconfirmed and/or controversial.
List.
The sizes are listed in units of <a href="Earth%20radius">Earth radii</a> (). All planets listed are smaller than <a href="Earth">Earth</a>, up to 0.7 <a href="Earth%20radius">Earth radii</a>. The <a href="NASA%20Exoplanet%20Archive">NASA Exoplanet Archive</a> is used as the main data source.
